extension.news: [v3.21.1]: * Dynamic AI subtitles translation from English to the selected Preferred Language in KODI's settings * Requires API Key * Currently only OpenAI and NexosAI backends are supported * For NexosAI model should be specified by ID, not name * Turning AI translation on - disables usage of embedded subtitles * Currently only supported when using auto-search or auto-download feature
